thread.title: Re: Fawn-tastic! WaPo claim about Obama’s athletic prowess gets fact checked
thread.title_full: Re: Fawn-tastic! WaPo claim about Obama’s athletic prowess gets fact checked

author: dankbubba
title: Re: Fawn-tastic! WaPo claim about Obama’s athletic prowess gets fact checked
text:
— Erielle Davidson (@politicalelle) February 8, 2017 
Former President Obama has been spending many of his post-presidency days in the Caribbean kitesurfing with Richard Branson In the third week of his post-presidential life, Barack Obama picked up a new skill: Kitesurfing https://t.co/rjzJABXPyE pic.twitter.com/eerWzNoMTr 
— Yahoo News (@YahooNews) February 8, 2017 
A Washington Post writer was very impressed: this has to be a parody https://t.co/Dp2tkXrdsP pic.twitter.com/kvoZVCeGVc 
— Elizabeth Harrington (@LizWFB) February 8, 2017 Trending
